name: Circle A Gura
description:
[Please launch full screen if you want to play this game in the browser.] Circle A Gura

Circle A Gura is a fan game themed with v-tuber Gura and her "A" meme. In this game, Gura is broadcasting a live with Bloop and Shrimp, but "A" tries to disrupt them. Players need to help Gura circle out 25 "A" in 100 seconds to prevent "A's" disruption and help Gura complete the dancing live. Otherwise, players will lose the game because the "A" ruin Gura's live. Let's help Gura finish her dancing live and stop the "A!"

Control:

Press the left mouse key and drag to draw circles.

Used Free Online Resource List:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12rkM27Pzu0WA_9EbfhxnqHjmQK9Sdj8D/edit?us...
